mapper.select: SELECT news_id as newsId, title, content, summary, url, thumbnail, category, created_at as createdAt, modified_at as modifiedAt, view_count as viewCount FROM news ORDER BY news_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT news_id as newsId, title, content, summary, url, thumbnail, category, created_at as createdAt, modified_at as modifiedAt FROM news WHERE summary IS NULL ORDER BY news_id ASC

SELECT n.news_id, n.title, n.content, n.summary, n.url, n.thumbnail, n.category, n.view_count, n.created_at, n.modified_at, c.id as comment_id, c.news_id, c.writer, c.content as comment_content, c.created_at as comment_created_at FROM news n LEFT JOIN news_comment c ON n.news_id = c.news_id WHERE n.news_id = #{id}

SELECT news_id as newsId, title, content, summary, url, thumbnail, category, view_count as viewCount, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as createdAt, DATE_FORMAT(modified_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as modifiedAt FROM news WHERE news_id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM news WHERE url = #{url}
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET summary = #{summary}, modified_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE news_id = #{newsId}
mapper.select: SELECT news_id as newsId, title, content, summary, url, thumbnail, category, created_at as createdAt, modified_at as modifiedAt, view_count as viewCount FROM news WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY news_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM news WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
